instructions.name: claim_any_nft
docs: Allow any user to claim any deposited NFT without restrictions

accounts.name: destination
docs: Destination wallet's ATA for this mint

instructions.name: initialize_project
docs: Initialize a new project with unique ID and custom fee
Each project gets its own PDA based on project_id

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin who will own and control this project (must be signer to pay for initialization)

accounts.name: project
docs: Project account PDA initialized with project_id as seed
Seeds: [b"project", project_id.to_le_bytes()]
Space allocation: 8 (discriminator) + 8 (project_id) + 54 (name String) + 104 (description String)
+ 32 (admin) + 32 (mint) + 8 (fee_amount) + 8 (created_at) = 254 bytes
Using 260 bytes for safety margin

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program for account creation and rent payment

accounts.name: withdraw_user_balance
docs: For SOL: [b"user_balance", user, b"sol"]
For other tokens: [b"user_balance", user, mint]
Renamed to withdraw_user_balance to avoid Anchor's pattern matching with DepositSol's user_balance
Using AccountInfo directly to completely bypass Anchor's validation

errors.name: NotAnNft
errors.msg: This token is not an NFT (decimals must be 0)

errors.name: NftMintMismatch
errors.msg: NFT mint address does not match deposited NFT

errors.name: AmountLessOrEqualFee
errors.msg: Requested amount must be greater than fee

errors.name: NoNftInVault
errors.msg: No NFT available in vault to claim

errors.name: InvalidInput
errors.msg: Invalid input - string length exceeds maximum

types.name: Project
docs: Project account structure for managing multiple projects under one program
Each project has a unique ID and can have custom fee settings

fields.name: project_id
docs: Unique project identifier (8 bytes)
Used in PDA derivation: [b"project", project_id.to_le_bytes()]

fields.name: name
docs: Project name, maximum 50 characters (4 + 50 bytes for String)

fields.name: description
docs: Project description, maximum 100 characters (4 + 100 bytes for String)

fields.name: admin
docs: Admin/owner public key who controls this project (32 bytes)
Only this admin can modify project settings

fields.name: mint
docs: Mint address associated with this project (32 bytes)
Can be token mint or SOL mint for identification

fields.name: fee_amount
docs: Custom fee amount for this project in lamports (8 bytes)
Used when processing transactions for this specific project

fields.name: created_at
docs: Unix timestamp when project was created (8 bytes)
Stored as i64 for signed timestamp representation
